REQUIREMENTS
------------
QKD Sequence and QKD Menu must run on Ubuntu 12.04 32 bits


RUNNING
-------
Copy the file vectis.conf in /var/idq
Start QKD Sequence by running the executable QKDSequence
ex. "sudo ./QKDSequence"
Start QKD Menu by running the executable QKDMenu
ex. "sudo ./QKDMenu"


NOTE
----
For more information, please refer to the id3100 User Guide.
